title: Founder at Resumate
description: Working on developing a scalable web app using React and Node.js.
My first time building from the ground up andshipping a product to users, lots to learn.

title: Production Engineering Fellow at Meta & MLH
description: Set up a Flask-based web app on a CentOS VPS.
Containerized services (Flask app, database, NGINX reverse proxy) for reliable deployment.
Got 1:1 mentorship with meta engineers, gaining exposure to industry production engineering techniques.

title: Software Engineering Intern at Arista Networks
description: Worked on the Arista CloudVision Platform, helped build new features in Go
Worked with the rest of the team to ensure seamless integration of new code using Git and Jenkins.

title: Assistant Lab Technician at IGSL
description: Tested of soils, rocks, concrete, and their properties. This mostly took the form of grain size analysis through sieve testing
Worked with other technicians to assess soil in sites before clearing them for projects like the construction of a new Lidl location.
